monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Anti Curse
skills.description: Aura: All Debuffs are 20% less effective on Monsters in your party.

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Breaking Spells
skills.description: Every magical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Buff Corruption
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness reduces the strength of Buffs and beneficial Stacks on enemies by 6%.

skills.name: Center of Mass
skills.description: Multi-Target-Attacks deal 30% extra damage to the enemy with the highest Health. Multi-Target-Heals heal the ally with the lowest Health by 30% more.

skills.name: Combo Initiator
skills.description: If this Monster acts first in the turn, it deals 25% more damage with its attack and deals an additional 25% damage hit.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Curse of Weakness
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Weakness on an enemy, 35% chance to also apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Demotivate
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness (Debuff) reduces enemies' healing and shielding by 20%.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dragonskin
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Dragonskin Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Dragonskin Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Eternal Heart
skills.description: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Gift of Life
skills.description: Revives all allies Heal all for 3 x (400 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hexed Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply a random Debuff on the attacker.

skills.name: Initial Weakness
skills.description: Apply Weakness (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Necromancy
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party is revived, it additionally heals 20% of its Max Health, gains 3 random Debuffs and 3 Age stacks.

skills.name: Neutral Weakness
skills.description: Neutral damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Shadow Storm
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Spore
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Spore Nebula
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Supply
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Monsters in the party by 4% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Sustained Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 30% Magic + 3% Max Health) Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Toxic Slam
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Slam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 90% (450%) physical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
